overview: Deadlines. Meetings. Long hours. We here at Lucas Entertainment feel your frustrations when it comes to stressful workplace situations. Wanna know how we deal with the daily grind? Watch ENCOUNTERS 4: On The Job! Starring Lucas exclusives Chad Hunt, Wilson Vasquez, Spencer Quest, and Jack Bond, as well as Vin Nolan, Pete Ross, Manuel Torres, and Ryann Wood, we've discovered that absolutely nothing can be as grueling” or horny” as a rough day on the job!
title: Encounters 4: On The Job
